app.header: Edit{fileName} js and save to reload
app.plural: {amount, plural, =0 {no languages} one {# one language} few {# several languages} many {# lots of languages} other {# wrong fromat}}
app.try.title: Try React
app.try.description: React has been designed from the start for gradual adoption, and you can use as little or as much React as you need. Whether you want to get a taste of React, add some interactivity to a simple HTML page, or start a complex React-powered app, the links in this section will help you get started.
